title: What Is Trill Alchemy? - Trill Alchemy Radio - Episode 1
content: What is "TRILL ALCHEMY?" Well, right here, Thursday night @ 9 pm EST, call in number (917) 889-3803, you're gonna find out.  A brand new show about Alchemy.  Trill Achemy.  Alchemy built for the True and the Real.  But most importantly, a Show that GETS TO THE POINT OF HEALING THE UNDERSERVED!!!  THE WARRIOR'S HEART!!  Imagine going to get some healing and in the waiting room, Outkast and Bun B & Pimp C are playing and you can't stop your head from bobbing to the beat.  	Are you ready for that "THRIVE LIFE?"  Have you had enough of the "Love & Light, everything is going to be just fine, stay happy all the time and just visualize your way to Nirvana with an activated Kundalini?"   I know I have.  Not to take away from those practiioners but everyone is not built like that to stay all 'fluffy' all the dang time.   We don't want the fluff all the time a
